effect.ruby_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. User is forced to use this move for five turns. Power doubles every time this move is used in succession to a maximum of 16x, and resets to normal after the lock-in ends. If this move misses or becomes unusable, the lock-in ends. If the user has used defense curl since entering the field, this move has double power.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, resetting after five turns.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: An attack lasting 5 turns with rising intensity.
flavor_text.emerald: An attack lasting 5 turns with rising intensity.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A 5-turn rolling attack that becomes stronger each time it hits.
